action.name: Action
action.description: Movies that feature intense physical activity, such as fights, chases, explosions, etc.

adventure.name: Adventure
adventure.description: Movies that involve exploration, discovery, or travel to exotic locations.

comedy.name: Comedy
comedy.description: Movies that are intended to make the audience laugh, often by using humor, satire, or parody.

drama.name: Drama
drama.description: Movies that focus on realistic characters, emotions, and situations, often dealing with serious themes or conflicts.

fantasy.name: Fantasy
fantasy.description: Movies that feature elements of magic, mythology, or supernatural phenomena, often set in imaginary worlds.
